description:
LATEST: Course Fully Updated July 2015

Did you know that your potential to attract money and create abundant wealth doesn't reside in your job, your current life circumstances, or even the economy?

The ability to attract incredible wealth resides within YOU.

The truth is that you are pure awesomeness! Your mind is equipped with the natural ability to attract as much money as you want and need — at anytime, anyplace, in any financial climate, and without struggle. And, all you need is just a little knowledge on how to activate and influence that incredible ally called your mind!

In this life-changing “abundance" program, you will learn how to tap into the awesome force of the Universal Law of Attraction, and focus it like a laser beam for one purpose, and one purpose only — attracting more money into your life.

You'll discover how to identify and conquer the unconscious mental blocks, money myths, and limiting beliefs that have been, up to now, preventing you from living the life of your dreams.

And in their place you will uncover empowering new thought processes that will open the floodgates to unlimited money and wealth. And you'll find out how to:

  • Attract money in any economy using a proven 6-step economy-proof formula
  • Reprogram your mind to start attracting money right away
  • Avoid the lies, myths, and media conspiracies that will keep you in a state of “victimhood" and “poverty consciousness"
  • Understand where your underlying beliefs about money came from and how to change them
  • Uncover compelling new reasons for wanting money that will amplify your money-attraction powers, allowing you to attract money & wealth easier and much faster than you can imagine
  • Utilize proven tips, insights and resources to help you attract money at lightning speed

Millions of people from all walks of life have experienced dramatic personal transformations through not only understanding how the Universal Law of Attraction works, but also how to apply it in their daily lives. So, if having money, wealth, prosperity, and financial freedom are at the top of your personal wish list, Money & Consciounsness;The Secret To Attracting Prosperity Now will act as the perfect blueprint to make your wishes come true.
title: Finances & Consciousness: Secrets to Attracting Prosperity
